body:
I'm trying to set up the Intel compiler, using an existing license on CentOS 7.6. To that end, I've set the variable 'INTEL_LICENSE_FILE' which for the Intel compiler can point either to a server, or to a file describing the server. I've tried both but get the same result in either case. This env var works fine otherwise (with the same version of the compiler downloaded from Intel's website).

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
setenv INTEL_LICENSE_FILE port@my-license-server-address
# OR
setenv INTEL_LICENSE_FILE /opt/intel/licenses/USER_SERVER.lic
spack install intel@19.0.5
```
